hero.tagline: From Our Family Farm to Your Table: Halal-Certified Cashews Grown with Purpose

aboutPreview.description: Three generations of cashew expertise meet modern ethical agribusiness. Founded by the Sangare family in 2023, we're revolutionizing West Africa's cashew industry through vertical integration, Islamic social responsibility, and sustainable innovation.
